scripts.redis: docker rm -f redis-gotdiff && docker run -d --restart=always --name redis-gotdiff -p 127.0.0.1:6379:6379 redis:alpine
scripts.couchdb: docker rm -f couchdb-gotdiff && docker run -d -e COUCHDB_USER=admin -e COUCHDB_PASSWORD=123 --name couchdb-gotdiff -p 5984:5984 --rm couchdb:3
scripts.replicate: curl -u admin:123 -X POST http://localhost:5984/_replicate -d '{"source":"https://replicate.npmjs.com/registry/", "target":"registry", "create_target":true, "continuous": true}' -H "Content-Type: application/json"
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development nodemon -r dotenv/config -e js,json,jsx -i views/ -i public/ -i test/dump/
